short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stick youtube comments so you can read them while watching videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can make the YouTube comments sticky so you can read them while watching videos. It works in full screen as well and very useful for ultrawide monitor users.
